name: groq-rephrase-widget
description: Always-on-top Groq AI rephrase widget for Windows

scripts.dev: node scripts/icon-white.js 2>nul & concurrently -k "vite" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.build: node scripts/icon-white.js && node scripts/build-icon.js && vite build && electron-builder --win --x64
scripts.build:dir: node scripts/icon-white.js && npx png-to-ico Logo-white.png > Logo.ico 2>nul && vite build && electron-packager . Rephrase --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out=dist-electron --overwrite --icon=Logo.ico --ignore=dist-electron --ignore=node_modules/.cache
